node.detail_zh: 患者居於將軍澳寶盈花園，近期於 1 月 24、25 日、2 月 1 至 8 日早上 9 至中午 12 時到過「福慧精舍」，其餘時間逗留在家中。患者於 2 月 13 日有咳嗽及痰，向私家醫生求醫，直至 2 月 23 日沒有好轉再求診。患者得知「福慧精舍」佛堂有確診個案後，致電衛生防護中心熱線，其後被送往聯合醫院。其同住的媳婦（第 #95 宗個案患者）於 2 月 29 日確診。另同住的兒子和孫兒正在接受檢疫。
node.detail_en: The patient lives in Bauhinia Garden, Tseung Kwan O. She had been at home most of the time, but visited Fook Wai Ching She between 9am to noon on Jan 24-25 and Feb 1-8. The patient developed cough with sputum on Feb 13 and consulted a private doctor on the same day. She continued to cough until Feb 23 and returned to the same doctor. Upon learning about the confirmed cases linked to the preaching hall, the patient called the Centre for Health Protection and was sent to United Christian Hospital. Her daugher-in-law, who lives with her, was diagnosed wth coronavrius on Feb 29. Her son and grandson are under quarantine.
node.classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者
node.group_description_zh: 「福慧精舍」佛堂位於北角美輪大廈，相關患者包括佛堂工作人員及善信。「福慧精舍」是本港第三宗超級傳播事件。福群組患者中，最早病發日期是 2 月 8 日。
node.group_description_en: "Fook Wai Ching She" is a Buddhist preaching hall located in Maylun Apartments, North Point. Related infected patients include staff members and followers. This is the third case of super-spreader. The case was first discovered on Feb 8.

node.remarks_zh: 2 月 23 日起出現咳嗽帶痰
node.remarks_en: Developed cough with sputum since Feb 13

node.location_zh: 書局街 1-25 號美輪大廈福慧精舍
node.location_en: Fook Wai Ching She, Maylun Apartments, 1-25 Shu Kuk Street
node.remarks_zh: 於 1 月 24、25 日以及 2 月1 日至 8 日期間每日到訪
node.remarks_en: Visited the preaching hall on Jan 24-25 and Feb 1-8
